page.about.head.title: About Page
page.about.head.mainText: turn a problem into a solution!
page.about.head.description.part1: - Hi, my name is Vladislav and I'm a developer. I try to keep up with new technologies and create beautiful and user-friendly websites. I enjoy developing website logic and writing APIs.
page.about.head.description.part2: - I believe that everyone needs their own approach, and websites are no exception.
page.about.head.description.part3: - Whether I'm working on a website, mobile app, or other digital product, I try to put my best foot forward in creating a masterpiece. What masterpiece will we create together?
